pledge_desc: Stake METAS to earn higher rewards.
explain_1: For your first staking, an approval signature is required to allow access to your METAS Tokens.
balance_no_100: METAS balance is insufficient or less than $100
form_get_title: Please enter the amount to claim
explain_2: Rewards will be received into the staking earnings account and can be withdrawn after release.
explain_3: Unclaimed rewards will continue to generate earnings.
explain_4: The Redeemed METAS will be sent to your on-chain wallet.
explain_5: Unlocked METAS that is not redeemed will continue to generate earnings.
balance_redeem_no: Insufficient METAS balance in the staking contract
explain_6: The contract will use your USDT to purchase METAS and pay for the UN gas fees.
explain_7: Convert USDT to METAS and deposit it into your wallet.
know_Protocol: to learn how to use the Metas Protocol.
technology: If you need technical support, please contact us at:
buy_node_2: The contract will use your USDT to purchase the node
pledge_describe_1: For your first staking, an approval signature is required to allow access to your METAS Tokens. The minimum staking amount must not be less than equivalent of 100 USD.
pledge_describe_2: Due to network conditions, on-chain confirmations may experience delays. If your staking order has not been created yet, please wait for the transaction to complete or check again after 5 minutes.
pledge_describe_3: If you encounter any issues, please refer to our tutorial or contact us via X.
redeem_describe_1: Redeemed METAS will be sent directly to your on-chain wallet. Unlocked METAS that is not redeemed will continue to generate earnings.
redeem_describe_2: Due to network conditions, on-chain confirmations may experience delayed. Please wait patiently for the transaction to complete or try again after 5 minutes.
redeem_describe_3: If you encounter any issues, please refer to our tutorial or contact us via X.
reward_receive_describe_1: Rewards will be claimed to your staking earnings account, and can be withdrawn after unlocked period. Unclaimed rewards will continue to generate compound earnings.
reward_receive_describe_2: Due to network conditions, on-chain confirmations may experience delayed. Please wait patiently for the transaction to complete or try again after 5 minutes.
reward_receive_describe_3: If you encounter any issues, please refer to our tutorial or contact us via X.
withdraw_describe_1: Due to network conditions, on-chain confirmations may experience delayed. Please wait patiently for the transaction to complete or try again after 5 minutes.
withdraw_describe_2: For assistance, please refer to our tutorial or contact us via X.
dao_text: Community-Driven Governance, with On-Chain Voting for Key Decisions.
晋升到下一级别需要推荐质押用户: Users Required to Advance to the Next Tier
晋升到下一级别需要小联盟质押: Small Alliance Staking Required to Advance to the Next Tier
web_2: Building a globally unified digital identity portal
web_4: Build a global prediction system and bring real-world events onto the blockchain through oracles.
web_6: Build a global-level prediction system, and synchronize real-world events to the blockchain through the oracle network.
web_8: Building an AI-powered Web3 social network that unifies social interaction, entertainment, and work.
pledge_my_total_describe: Amount of METAS Deposited into the Staking Pool
release_describe: Staking Value ÷ Staking Days — Daily Unlock Continues to Earn Rewards
receive_describe: Daily staking rewards = Pending Unlock Value + Unredeemed Value + Claimable Rewards Value.Unclaimed rewards continue to compound.
awawd_describe: All rewards will first be credited to my earnings and then transferred to the withdrawable balance after being released.
contribute_describe: Contribution Value = Total Staked Value × 5, and it decreases as dynamic rewards are distributed.
withdrawl_describe: The available balance can be sent to the wallet after 12 hours of withdrawal.
user_describe: The number of users you recommended, with the number of pledged users in parentheses
production_describe: The total amount of METAS generated from the collateral pool contract
wager_info: Bet Yes or No with METAS from your wallet, and calculate the prize based on your share after the draw.
entenrQuantity: Enter the quantity to be claimed
